summary: This is an email from an FBI employee to another regarding an Epstein-related FOIA request being handled by an AUSA in the Civil Division. The sender is informing the recipient that the AUSA may need to contact someone in the OIG and seeks permission to share the recipient's contact information.

events.title: FOIA Request Coordination Email
events.description: An FBI employee emails a colleague to inform them about an Epstein-related FOIA request being handled by an AUSA, and to coordinate potential contact with the OIG.

keyFacts: An AUSA in the Civil Division was handling an Epstein-related FOIA request as of May 2020.
The FBI was aware of and being kept informed about the progress of this FOIA matter.
Coordination was occurring between the FBI and the Office of the Inspector General (OIG) regarding potential contact related to the FOIA request.
